title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slickdeals' AI-powered deal discovery with Amazon Sagemaker (SMB206)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Slickdeals 基于 Amazon SageMaker 的 AI 驱动优惠发现 (SMB206)
abstract: Discover how Slickdeals transformed from a heuristics-based platform to an AI-powered deal discovery engine using Amazon SageMaker. Learn how this e-commerce leader, which has saved shoppers over $10 billion, implemented five critical ML use cases including content summarization, deal personalization, and intelligent recommendations. We'll dive into their journey of modernizing their search and personalization algorithms, achieving enhanced user experiences for millions of shoppers. Join us to explore their ML implementation strategy, current results, and future optimization plans for peak shopping periods.
abstract_cn: 了解 Slickdeals 如何使用 Amazon SageMaker 从基于启发式的平台转变为 AI 驱动的优惠发现引擎。了解这家为购物者节省超过 100 亿美元的电商领导者如何实施五个关键的机器学习用例，包括内容摘要、优惠个性化和智能推荐。我们将深入探讨他们现代化搜索和个性化算法的历程，为数百万购物者实现增强的用户体验。加入我们，探索他们的机器学习实施策略、当前成果以及购物高峰期的未来优化计划。
